---
title: "Split Training and Test"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

Read in dataframe with bands and lcz

```{r}
all_dat <- readRDS(here("results", "hk_df.rds"))
```

Check that types are correct

```{r}
summary(all_dat)
```

Remove NAs and places with no LCZ class

```{r}
polys_only <- all_dat %>%
  filter(lcz != 0) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(polygon_id = as.numeric(polygon_id))
```

Look at summaries again

```{r}
summary(polys_only$lcz)
summary(polys_only)

ggplot(polys_only, aes(x=polygon_id))+
  geom_histogram()
```
